Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the road between Oceancrest and the eastern cities.
Room.LongDescription: To the northwest is a short but steep hill, and below it to the north is a walnut and oak covered valley. From here you see a group of small houses in the valley. There are large rocks and boulders in the plains to the south, part of the badlands a long way to the south.
